name: Frogs on Dirtbikes
description:
Hi everyone! 

I'm working on a small prototype about dirtbiking forest animals.  
In this game you can build and edit your own dirtbike track and let frogs race it!

You can play the webversion but it doesn't have grass for some reason, the windows version looks a little bit better!

Objective

Bike through the clouds to gain points, the more points you have the more stuff you can build. 

Also it's kind of a sandbox game right now, just have some fun and build cool tracks. 

How to play Road tools

Buy the road tool from the menu. 
Press the right button on the last track part to add more parts.
Press left click to actually add a road point to the track. 
Left click and drag to drag yellow road points. 
The road will automatically flow between the yellow road points. 
You can right-click anywhere on the road to add more road points. 
If you right-click on a road point it will add a branch from the main road. 
Make sure your path is a complete circle, now you can add a frog to your racetrack!

Camera control

WASD to move around, hold middle mouse button to look around.

Object placement

Buy objects from the store (you can't place them if you don't have money or if something is blocking the object). 
Left click again on the terrain to place them.
Right click to delete (no refunds).

Infinity money cheat

If you just want to build you can press 1+9 at the same time. 
This will give you 999 coins.  You can decide what's most fun to you :) 

Bugfixes / updates

8-sept-2021: 

Made the frogs faster (now they don't get stuck on hills)

Fixed the game breaking bug when spawning frogs without a road. 

Upgraded the path following AI.

Added a tutorial to the game for path-building. 

Known bugs

- You delete objects when right clicking on paths.
